title: Hero Tuba Player Trolls KKK March With Doofy Music And It's Hilarious (WATCH) | Alex | Y93
text:
Hero Tuba Player Trolls KKK March With Doofy Music And It's Hilarious (WATCH) posted by Alex Gervasi - 
I don't know much about what is happening here, but I do know that this tuba player deserves an award. 
I honestly cannot stop laughing at this. What grade A trolling. 
Also, can we not have KKK marches ever? Thanks. 
Hero tuba player trolls entire KKK march with doofy music #AntiFa Posted by Great Lakes AntiFa on Sunday, February 26, 2017 Tweets by @AlexontheMic What's up? I'm Alex! So I guess I'll tell you a little bit about myself. I grew up in South Jersey (10 minutes from Philly) and went to school a few minutes from Lexington, Kentucky. Growing up I always wanted to be on the air. What's better than talking about and listening to music for a living? Sounds like a pretty good job to me. I'm here to to provide some good music for your ears and keep you informed on all the latest things happening around here. Sound good? Follow me on Twitter/Instagram: @alexonthemic Contact
